statements: SELECT * FROM ticket_sales_data;
SELECT event_name, tickets_sold FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(ticket_price) AS total_revenue FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_id, event_name, tickets_sold, venue_name FROM ticket_sales_data ORDER BY tickets_sold DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT event_name, MAX(ticket_price) AS max_price FROM ticket_sales_data GROUP BY event_name
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT venue_name, COUNT(event_id) AS total_events FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE tickets_sold > 100 GROUP BY venue_name ORDER BY total_events DESC
SELECT AVG(ticket_price) AS avg_price, SUM(tickets_sold) AS total_tickets_sold FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales_data WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY event_name ASC
SELECT * FROM event_tickets;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM event_tickets WHERE ticket_quantity > 0 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY ticket_id HAVING total_sales > 1000;
SELECT event_name, DATE_FORMAT(event_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM event_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, event_name, event_date, ticket_price, ticket_quantity FROM event_tickets WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_tickets ORDER BY event_name;
SELECT event_name, SUM(ticket_quantity) as total_tickets_sold FROM event_tickets JOIN ticket_sales ON event_tickets.ticket_id = ticket_sales.ticket_id GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT customer_name, sale_amount FROM ticket_sales WHERE payment_method='Credit Card' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT event_name, event_date FROM event_tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY event_date;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE tickets_sold > 100;
SELECT event_name, price FROM ticket_sales WHERE event_date >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT event_name, venue, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT event_name, ticket_type, price FROM ticket_sales WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_type, price FROM ticket_sales WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT event_name, venue, ticket_capacity FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC, ticket_capacity ASC;
SELECT event_name, SUM(tickets_sold) as total_tickets_sold FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT customers.customer_name, events.event_name FROM customers JOIN events ON customers.customer_id = events.event_id;
SELECT * FROM event_tickets;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM event_tickets WHERE tickets_sold > 100;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue FROM events WHERE total_tickets_available > 0 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, venue, total_tickets_available FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM event_tickets WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue FROM events WHERE total_tickets_available > 0 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, tickets_sold, (ticket_price * tickets_sold) AS total_revenue FROM event_tickets WHERE tickets_sold > 100 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM events ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM venues WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, events.event_name, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN events ON orders.event_id = events.event_id WHERE customers.email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT event_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM events JOIN orders ON events.event_id = orders.event_id GROUP BY event_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT venue_name, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM venues JOIN events ON venues.venue_id = events.event_id GROUP BY venue_name HAVING total_events >= 3 ORDER BY total_events DESC;
